# Town Council

 

Physical Address:

645 Beacon Lite Road  
Monument, CO 80132

Mailing Address:

645 Beacon Lite Road  
Monument, CO 80132

Phone:

719-481-2954

Fax:

719-884-8046

Link: [Town Council Information](https://www.townofmonument.org/260/Board-of-Trustees)

 ![13](https://www.townofmonument.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=4772)

    (top row, left to right: Councilmember Ken Kimple, Mayor Mitch LaKind, Councilmember Jim Romanello)  
    (bottom row, left to right: Mayor Pro Tem Steve King, Councilmember Laura Kronick, Councilmember Marco Fiorito)   
(not pictured: Councilmember Sana Abbott)

### CONTACT US

1. Town of Monument
2. 645 Beacon Lite Road
3. Monument, CO 80132
4. Phone: 719-481-2954
5. Fax: 719-884-8046
6. Police Phone:  
   719-481-3253
7. Hours: 8am to 5pm
8. Monday to Friday.
